item.description:
I have to reschedule the Boston Ecademy Meetup to Thursday, June 29th. Sorry for the inconvenience. Please RSVP so other members will know who are planning to attend. Thanks for your cooperation.

The meeting agenda will be as follows:

6:00-6:15 Introduction
6:15-6:45 Guest Speaker I - Barbara Bix
6:45-7:30 Speed Networking
7:30-8:00 Facilitated Discussion

Adjourn at 8:00PM

Doors are locked for security reasons. If you come late, please call me at (617) 429-6571 and I'll let you in.

Best regards,
- Phil
item.name: Boston Ecademy June Meetup
